Instruction: 'Slice the bagel in half and toast until golden brown.'
In a small bowl, mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.'
'Spread the mashed avocado mixture on each half of the toasted bagel.'
'Arrange tomato slices on top of the avocado.'
Season with additional salt and pepper, if desired.'
'Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing avocado and tomato bagel!'
